Title: Siblings Fighting Strategy
Text: Carer: "What's the problem here?". Children start shouting at carer to give their side of story.

Options.Description: Carer: “Remember the house rules – be kind to each other and play nicely. If you can’t do this, the consequence is that you have to each play separately in your room for half an hour. This is your warning. If I have to come back in here, you are going to your rooms.”
“We are going to take turns explaining the problem and you will both get a chance to speak.”
